name: Tokyo Night Drifter Free Roam Prototype
name_original: Tokyo Night Drifter Free Roam Prototype
description:
Tokyo Night Drifter, as the name suggests, is a game about driving in Tokyo.

This prototype has nothing more than a barebone city and a car to drive in it. The city is based on 1:1 real life Tokyo City surrounded by Yamanote-sen, though none of the iconic architecture has been added to the game yet. Have some fun driving, hopefully.

The full game expects to feature:

  • A story that can be finished within about 2 hours for the introduction of Tokyo City geography.
  • Probably a track list of 20 songs for you to chill drive in Tokyo City without any goal.
  • Daily racing challenge for endless suffering.

Don't expect the end result to be something like AAA driving game where there's amazing destruction and stuff. But feel free to tell me what you'd like to see in it.

Control Scheme:

  • Throttle - W/↑/RT/R2
  • Brake - S/↓/LT/L2
  • Steer - AD/←→/Left Stick
  • Handbrake - Space/B/O
